home.title:
Hi, I'm <1>Ignacio!</1>
 A <1>full-stack developer</1> with <1>3 years of experience</1>.
 I enjoy building beautiful sites & apps.
 My focus is <1>React & Node</1>.

about.title: About me
about.introduction: I had my first taste of programming in highschool, where I learned Ladder, Assembly and a bit of C and C++. It was there that I realized my love for programming and solving complex problems in the most elegant way possible, and I just knew I wanted to continue doing this for a living. After that, I decided to enroll in a coding bootcamp, where I learned <1>full-stack web development</1>.
about.stack: My core stack is <1>React, Next.js, Node.js, Express.js, GraphQL, PostgreSQL</1> and <1>MongoDB</1>, along with <1>TypeScript</1> and <1>Prisma</1> or <1>Sequelize</1>. I'm always eager to learn new technologies.

item0.description: A fully-fledged Discord clone, with all the features from the original app.

item1.description: A real time chat application with group chat support.

item2.description: A weather app where users can fetch and visualize data in graphs and maps.

item3.description: A kanban board app where users can organize tasks with their team.

item0.title: Graduated Bootcamp
item0.description:
I graduated after 4 months of studying and delivering projects.
 I immediately found a job as a front-end developer.

item1.title: Frontend Developer
item1.description:
Designed and developed a Web3-based social media site with real-time media streaming.
 Remodelled the frontend, reducing rendering times and increasing communication quality by migrating from class to functional components and integrating React Hooks.
 Wrote automated frontend tests with Jest and Testing Library.

item2.title: Freelance Developer
item2.description:
Built a mobile app for a client's barber shop.
 Developed using React Native and MongoDB.

item3.title: Fullstack Developer
item3.description:
Worked in multiple SaaS projects involving microservices and  microfrontends.
 Developed using React, APIs with Django & GraphQL, DBs with PostgreSQL & MongoDB and performed direct DB adminsitration with SQL.

footer.text:
About this website: built with React & Vite, TypeScript, Vanilla Extract, Resend, Vercel hosting.
All components, styling & animations were made manually.
